name: route-optimization-app
description: Full-stack route optimization application with .NET backend and React frontend

scripts.install:all: yarn run install:frontend && yarn run install:backend
scripts.build: yarn run build:frontend && yarn run build:backend
scripts.clean: yarn run clean:frontend && yarn run clean:backend
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul || echo Frontend cleaned
